title: IRefPointFeatureData.IGetSelections
description: Gets the selected entities to use to create the reference points.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of selected entities of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IRefPointFeatureData::GetSelectionsCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
